description: woman with large hat has her hands positioned on the upper and lower jaws of a lion whose mouth is open; the lion is leaning against her in the lower right quadrant; Roman numeral XI printed on top border and LA FORCE printed on bottom; from a deck of 78 hand-colored triumph playing cards
provenance:
'Lady Charlotte Elizabeth Schrieber, 1812-1895, London [1]. Carl A. Weyerhaeuser, Minneapolis (by 1937); given to MIA, 1996.

1. Note with deck states: "Swiss Tarot. / Complete 78 Cards / from Schreiber Collection"
title: Strength
